briefTitle: Epidemiology Study in Postmenopausal Women With Estrogen Receptor Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: An Epidemiological, Non-interventional Study to Evaluate Patient Compliance in Postmenopausal Women With Estrogen Receptor Positive Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluate compliance rate, as assessed by investigator, after 12 months from baseline.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal females with estrogen receptor positive breast cancer that are currently treated with aromatase inhibitor (AI) medication
* Provision of subject informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* If participating in any clinical trial, the subject cannot take part in this study.
